sentences.sContent: They, like other necessity entrepreneurs, may have resorted to entrepreneurship due to a lack of better options.
sentences.sContent_eng: They, like other necessity entrepreneurs, may have resorted to entrepreneurship due to a lack of better options.
sentences.sCn: 他们像其他生存型企业家一样，因为没有更好的选择才会诉诸于创业。

trans.tranOther: Entrepreneurship is the state of being an entrepreneur, or the activities associated with being an entrepreneur
